definition: A meteorological phenomenon characterized by the descent of frozen water particles from the atmosphere to the ground, typically in the form of delicate ice crystals or snowflakes. It is commonly used to describe the occurrence of snowfall during winter seasons or in regions with cold climates.

examples.german: Der Schneefall hat den Verkehr beeinträchtigt.
examples.english: The snowfall has affected the traffic.

examples.german: Der Schneefall hat eine weiße Decke über die Landschaft gelegt.
examples.english: The snowfall has covered the landscape with a white blanket.

examples.german: Der Schneefall hat zu einer Absage des Fußballspiels geführt.
examples.english: The snowfall has led to the cancellation of the football match.

examples.german: Der Schneefall hat die Straßen glatt gemacht.
examples.english: The snowfall has made the roads slippery.
